mapper.select: select c.id, c.author, d.name dept, e.name, c.title, c.publish, c.ts, case when s.n = 3 then 3 when s.x < 2 then 1 else 2 end stat from doc c, emp e, dept d, approval a, ( select doc.id, min(stat) n, max(stat) x from approval, doc where doc_id = doc.id group by doc_id) s where e.dept_id = d.id and c.author = e.id and c.id = a.doc_id and c.id = s.id and (c.author = #{empId} or a.approver = #{empId} and 0 < a.stat or c.publish = true and s.n = 3) group by a.doc_id order by stat, c.id desc
